reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish, with one noting the scallop neck adds flair, and appreciate its well-made construction, softness, and lightweight feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft fabric and great fit!
items.body: Nice, lightweight and pretty. Read more
items.author: bublegrl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
items.body: This sweater is a very pretty red, and runs true to size. It is soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Mary Ann Leusing

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, soft, lightweight sweater.
items.body: Precious lightweight sweater. I love the style and it feels so soft. The detailing around the neck and sleeve set this one apart. I haven’t washed it yet but I will soon. I can’t wear it now because of the wrinkles caused by the vacuum bag that it came in. If that doesn’t work, I will update my post. I would have given it five stars but because of the wrinkles I could not. The color is as pictured and the fit is true to size. It appears to be made very well. It does have some stretch but I don’t think it will loose its shape. After I wash it, I will lay it flat to dry. I would buy this sweater again for sure. It is so stylish and on trend. With that being said, if I can get the wrinkles out. I am 5’7” and weigh 145# and purchased a large. Great fit! Read more
items.author: Deborah B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fitting light sweater
items.body: Loved the collar details. Fits well on my body. Light but still enough heft to be the perfect sweater for a fall day. Easily pair with a necklace or scarf. The material feels nice and I loved the color. Read more
items.author: Caroline Danda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will buy again!
items.body: Absolutely love, love, love this sweater. Super soft, comfortable and beautiful! Love the neckline and fit! Will be purchasing different colors. It is a light weight sweater, but keeps me warm enough on the cooler days. Absolutely love this sweater!!! Read more
items.author: L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add to cart!
items.body: This sweater exceeded my expectations. I am 5'2, 116 lbs, and I ordered a small which fit perfectly. I was afraid it would be too loose and long, like a tunic, but it is the perfect length, right at the hips. I got the dark red and the white trim really elevates the look. The neckline is super cute, not too low but great with couple of layered necklaces. I wore it to a Christmas event with white pants (I live in Florida) and it will also be great with jeans for a more casual look. The material is so nice, not too thin or too heavy. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Paula Dianne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Truly a lightweight top.
items.body: The beige color and the neckline beautifully outlined were the reasons for my purchase. I returned it due to the thin fabric, although it is described as lightweight, it was no warmer than a long sleeve t-shirt. The fabric was stretchy, and stylish, just to thin for my preference. Read more
items.author: Karen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: I’ve been looking for a Christmas sweater and finally found one! I love it. Nice lightweight soft material, beautiful color, great fit. Think I’ll get a couple more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Joanietik

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black/Beige, Blue, Polka Dots, Solid Purple, Apricot, Solid White, Black, Mocha, Coffee, Solid Green, Dark Red, Navy, Khaki, Flower 2. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
